item.title: How to Create a Hugo Blog Using GitHub
item.description: I am a professional developer, but I believe you do not need to be one to build a blog with some code. There are many tools out there that (usually with a fee) allow us to create websites without programming, and it is okay to use them. However, if you, like me, just want a simple blog that you’d like to have control over, likes to code you can go with this approach.

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? I’m Victor Schumann Macário, a programmer from Brazil and currently living and working in Portugal. I decided to start this blog since I was having some stubborn ideas after reading some books, and wanted to write about them. This blog is my personal notebook of things that I would like to write, remember or share. I did try to write a blog before, with SEO strategies, ad revenue, niche focused… and I posted every day.
